dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaints
dmca.body:
Sept. 13, 2007

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, Blogger DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA [private]

Dear Blogger Legal Support,
	One of your members has recently posted our record "Chillodesiac Lounge vol. 1: FEVER" online for free download.  The copyrighted music and artwork are on the following page: http://siralek-musica.blogspot.com/search?q=fever

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.  And since I am the owner of the copyrighted material, I am POSITIVE he has no right to use or distribute this material.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.  As you can see by our letterhead, we are indeed Worldwide Groove Corporation.

Thank you,
[private]
President
[private]

[page 2]

Sept. 13, 2007Sept. 13, 2007

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, Blogger DMCA Complaints
[private]

Thank you,

[private]
Dear Blogger Legal Support,
One of your members has recently posted our record "Chillodesiac Lounge vol. 1: FEVER" online for free download.  The copyrighted music and artwork are on the following page:
htp://demfm.blogspot.com/2007/06/worldwide-groove-corporation-fever.html.  This user is storing these files on the rapidshare.comwebsite.  I am also filing a formal complaint with that website.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.  And since I am the owner of the copyrighted material, I am POSITIVE he has no right to use or distribute this material.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.  As you can see by our letterhead, we are indeed Worldwide Groove Corporation.

Thank you,
[private]
President
[private]
